data.price: I reci: "Gospodaru moj, uvedi me uvodom Istine i izvedi me ishodom Istine! I daruj mi od Sebe moć koja će mi pomoći!"
data.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَدۡخِلۡنِي مُدۡخَلَ صِدۡقٖ وَأَخۡرِجۡنِي مُخۡرَجَ صِدۡقٖ وَٱجۡعَل لِّي مِن لَّدُنكَ سُلۡطَٰنٗا نَّصِيرٗا

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi adkhil'nī mud'khala ṣid'qin wa-akhrij'nī mukh'raja ṣid'qin wa-ij'ʿal lī min ladunka sul'ṭānan naṣīran

dua.name: Dua for Ethical Conduct
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine assistance in maintaining moral integrity and entering situations with righteousness and dignity.

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com
